The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 August is 283,280 (503.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 21 August, there were 6,145 new confirmed cases (10.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 August, there were 6,896 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 11% (751 fewer cases).
